rows.label: qev080101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Kupee so curious! What does this key unlock?
And what is secret treasure of Mysteroid friends?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0002
rows.name:
Kupee not get wink of sleep with so many questions
rolling around inside poor head. ...So maybe friend
help unravel riddle of Mysteroids?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev080101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Kupee for more information about the treasure.

rows.label: qev080101_JNK0020
rows.name: Question

rows.label: qev080101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Kupee what in the heck a "Mysteroid" is.

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Strange Mysteroid friend gave Kupee key that is
supposed to unlock huuuge treasure![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0004
rows.name:
Strange friend said it was something incredible!
But exact identity of treasure is still big mysteroid.
...Er, mystery.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0005
rows.name: It is friend who gave Kupee this curious key.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0006
rows.name:
Mira has many strange xenos, but Kupee never see
anything quite so mysterious as that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0007
rows.name:
So Kupee made up name "Mysteroid" and invented
rich backstory for use in later fan-fiction writing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0008
rows.name:
It seem like that Mysteroid came to Mira with others
of its kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0009
rows.name:
But Mira too dangerous for Mysteroid friends.
By the time one reached caravan of Kupee,
all other Mysteroids were dead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Kupee felt sad for him, so Kupee gave him food and
drink.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0011
rows.name:
And in return, Mysteroid left this key before vanishing
into darkest night.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0012
rows.name:
Oh, but Mysteroid friend also left strange message.
*ahem* Mi mi miiiii...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0013
rows.name:
"My kinsmen sleep, yet point the way to a treasure
great and vast. With it shall this world be destroyed,
and then reborn at last."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0014
rows.name:
Compelling, yes? Enough to rob friend of sleep, yes?
Meh heh! Now poor friend has been dragged into this!
Only way to find peace is to find treasure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0015
rows.name:
Okay then! Kupee fill friend in on all the deets.
Mysteroid friend said there are three "sleeping kinsmen"
here in Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0016
rows.name:
He left hints to locations in mysterious riddle form.
...Which is dumb. But whatever![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0017
rows.name:
Clues are "south of the lake, beside four turtles,"
"in sight of the southern hold, by the flightless bird,"
and, "at the lakeside foot of the wayward mount."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0018
rows.name: ...None of which make ANY sense to Kupee.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0019
rows.name:
Brain of Kupee will overheat if he think any harder!
Waiting for friend to find them all by trial and error
sound like much better plan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0020
rows.name:
Has friend forgotten hints Mysteroid friend left?
Kupee can repeat them again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_JNK0030
rows.name: Request

rows.label: qev080101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Kupee to hear the clues again.

rows.label: qev080101_JNK0040
rows.name: Dismiss

rows.label: qev080101_SEL0041
rows.name: Say that you remember them.

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0021
rows.name: Locations of "sleeping kinsmen" from riddle are...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0022
rows.name:
"South of the lake, beside four turtles,"
"in sight of the southern hold, by the flightless bird,"
and, "at the lakeside foot of the wayward mount."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0023
rows.name:
...Or so strange friend said. They are all supposed to
be in Sylvalum, so no sense looking farther than that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0024
rows.name: Meh-meh! Friend has excellent memory![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0025
rows.name:
Oh, wait! Kupee just remembered that Mysteroid friend
left one more riddle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0026
rows.name:
"Our greatest treasure may already be old and well
familiar to you."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0027
rows.name:
...But Kupee never seen or heard of anything able to
destroy whole world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0028
rows.name:
It is mystery wrapped in enigma wrapped in dumb!
Poor head of Kupee about to turn into pile of goo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0029
rows.name: Make any progress on riddle of Mysteroid friend?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0030
rows.name: ...What? Friend found three graves across Sylvalum?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0031
rows.name:
Ah! Meh-meh! That must be "sleeping kinsmen"!
Kupee bet real money there are other Mysteroids
buried in graves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0032
rows.name:
So then? What was written on graves?
Kupee want to hear all![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0037
rows.name:
..."Our treasure is bane to any wall,
able to harm or heal one and all—193."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0038
rows.name:
"Our treasure is succor to all of the poor,
a flame that incinerates all evermore—128."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0039
rows.name:
"Our treasure alone is fit to awaken
the way to a world that is long forsaken—1986."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0069
rows.name:
...MEH-MEH-MEEEEEEH! More stupid riddles!
What does any of that MEAN?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_JNK0050
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev080101_SEL0051
rows.name: Point out the strange numbers at the end of each line.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_JNK0060
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev080101_SEL0061
rows.name:
Ask Kupee about the curious
words written on the graves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0033
rows.name: Strange numbers... Hrmmm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0034
rows.name:
Oh! Meh-meh! Could they be coordinates for place
where secret treasure is?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0035
rows.name:
If first is X coordinate, then second is Y.
Er, and third is probably elevation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0036
rows.name:
That must be it! So hurry up and GO GO GO!
Grab amazing treasure right away![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0040
rows.name:
Riddle says it is bane to any wall...
Could it be some kind of weapon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0041
rows.name: And numbers seem like they could be coordinates...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0042
rows.name:
Probably worth going to check right away!
...Er, for friend, that is. But Kupee will wait here in
eager state of anticipation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0043
rows.name:
Friend should hurry to coordinates from gravestones.
That has to be where the amazing treasure of
Mysteroids is waiting.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0044
rows.name: Well? Did friend find treasure of Mysteroids?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0045
rows.name:
...Hrrrrmm? For all that talk about destroying world,
that is awfully small box.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0046
rows.name:
Huh? It has keyhole. Maybe Kupee should try key that
Mysteroid friend left...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0047
rows.name:
Ah! It opened! Gold! Silver! Precious jewels!
...Wait no. There is just weird book inside. Meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_JNK0070
rows.name: Request

rows.label: qev080101_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Kupee to read the book.

rows.label: qev080101_JNK0080
rows.name: Ignore

rows.label: qev080101_SEL0081
rows.name: Say that all you care about is getting paid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0048
rows.name:
Ooo, right! All Kupee care about is solving mystery
so he can finally sleep at night.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0049
rows.name: Wait one minute for Kupee to translate text...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0050
rows.name:
Friend is unbelievably cold. This mystery has been
keeping Kupee up for days now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0051
rows.name:
Kupee almost jealous that friend has such complete lack
of curiosity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0052
rows.name:
But suspense still killing Kupee, so wait here while
Kupee translate text...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0053
rows.name:
Hrrrm de derrrrm... Meh-meh-meeeeeeh...
HmmmmMMmMMMmmmmmMMmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0054
rows.name:
Ah, Kupee see! This book is about thing that Mysteroid
friends hold most precious.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0055
rows.name:
"Our treasure is bane to any wall,
able to harm or heal one and all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0056
rows.name:
"Our treasure is succor to all of the poor,
a flame that incinerates all evermore.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0057
rows.name:
"Our treasure alone is fit to awaken
the way to a world that is long forsaken.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0058
rows.name:
"That treasure is love—the light that shines our way
even through the darkest of struggles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0059
rows.name:
"I record our love here, that we may never forget it.
That we may use it as a beacon to guide us as we
wander the vastness of space."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0060
rows.name: Wow. Deep.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0061
rows.name:
But Kupee not understand in slightest!
Can friend make sense of it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_JNK0090
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev080101_SEL0091
rows.name: Expound on the glory of love to Kupee.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_JNK0100
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev080101_SEL0101
rows.name: Shake your head and say that it's beyond you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0062
rows.name:
Friend is amazing to be able to analyze such complex
document so quickly! Friend should be translator!
...But Kupee still not understand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0063
rows.name:
Friend too? Hmm. Kupee guess Mysteroids will stay
mystery to bitter end.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0064
rows.name:
Kupee still not feel satisfied, but friend was big help
anyway. Thanks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0065
rows.name:
Hmm, that thing Mysteroid friend said after Kupee fed
him meal...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0066
rows.name:
"Our greatest treasure may already be old and well
familiar to you."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0067
rows.name: Does that mean Kupee already have love?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev080101_MSG0068
rows.name:
That seem like yet another mystery. Meh!
Kupee have even more sleepless nights ahead...[ST:wait ]
